message:
if you know someone who is qualified for this position, please let him/her know and don't hesitate to get back to me if you wanna ask about anything:

a Senior IOS Developer is needed.
Minimum 3 years of experience.

name: sarmady.net
caption: sarmady.net
description: Sarmady is a digital publishing and marketing company. Sarmady has been creating unique, regionally relevant and trusted content in Egypt since 2001 while helping brands, non-profits and start-ups to reach targeted audiences on both the web and mobile.
